inclusion.criterion: Male patients with lower urinary tract symptoms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female patients with overactive bladder syndrome
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: 62 yo male with hx of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter with multiple prior admissions for UTIs, altered mental status, and urosepsis presents to the hospital in urosepsis now resolved after treatment with vanc/meropenem.
